project_descr: NIP update, integration of POPs into national planning and promoting sound healthcare waste management in Kazakhstan

outputs.output_descr: To reduce the releases of uPOPs and other globally harmful pollutants into the environment by promoting sound HCWM in Kazakhstan, to assist the country in implementing its relevant obligations under the Stockholm Convention.

document_name: NIP update, integration of POPs into national planning and promoting sound healthcare waste management in Kazakhstan
NIP Update, Integration of POPs into National Planning and Promoting Sound Healthcare Waste Management in Kazakhstan
ITB on Procurement of Vehicles for hazardous waste
Procurement of small autoclaves for the treatment of infectious healthcare waste and Procurement of shredders for grinding decontaminated healthcare waste
Procurement of Vehicles for hazardous waste with engine capacity not less than 70 KWT (105) and Procurement of Vehicles for hazardous waste with engine capacity not less than 50 KWT (70)
RFQ_Procurement of related materials of equipment for the treatment of infectious healthcare waste
Services on sampling and conducting laboratory analysis of air and soil on persistent organic pollutants for environmental monitoring
